element.short: An inline code system, which is part of this value set
element.definition: A definition of a code system, inlined into the value set (as a packaging convenience). Note that the inline code system may be used from other value sets by referring to its (codeSystem.system) directly.
element.comments: All code systems defined as part of a FHIR value set have an implicit valueset that includes all of the codes in the code system - the value set in which they are defined.

constraint.human: Within a code system definition, all the codes SHALL be unique
